Articles.Content: I am trying to recreate a Falcon 9, which will be reusable. The problem is, I need to shut off tanks and stuff for it to work, so I want action groups to turn specific tanks on and off, for example, only for liquid fuel, only for oxidizer, or for both.
Sounds good! Most other things can be controlled with action groups, so why not fuel flow?
Been asking for this myself. Hopefully in .22!
I don't really use mods that much

I understand, but personally I feel something like TAC FB should be incorporated in the stock game....And its a simple plugin to install, and has a real basic, intuitive UI, and also requires no added parts.
